text: Vy mozhete ubyty tsi khto zarplata viyna proty vas, ta vy mozhete evict yim zvidky vony evicted vy. Pryhnichennya ye hirshe nizh vbyvstvo. Ne boritʹsya yim u Svyashchenni Masjid, yakshcho ne vony atakuyutʹ vas tam. Yakshcho vony atakuyutʹ vas, vy mozhete ubyty yikh. Tse yavlyaye soboyu spravedlyvyy retribution dlya tsykh disbelievers
